definition: to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: Cultures from the samples were grown on two sorts of media.
sentences.chinese: 樣本細菌接著放在兩種不同環境中培養。

sentences.english: Next you should clean up the hard disk.
Then, the wave catches the surfboard and pulls it and the surfer toward the shore.
sentences.chinese: 接著大浪會湧向滑板，將滑板與衝浪者推往海岸。

sentences.english: The fox raid the henhouse and run off with its prize.
sentences.chinese: 狐狸襲擊雞舍，接著帶著俘獲物逃走了。

sentences.english: His face crimsoned when he saw her.
sentences.chinese: 瑪姬感到很窘，接著臉色變得通紅。

sentences.english: Then Eliphaz the Themanite answered, and said.
sentences.chinese: 特曼人厄裏法次接著說。

sentences.english: Then he goes on to give this young pastor some good fatherly advice.
sentences.chinese: 接著，他又慈愛的給這位年輕的牧者一些忠告。

sentences.english: Next, the organisms might have added protein making to their bag of chemical tricks.
sentences.chinese: 接著，生命體可能把蛋白質加入它們的化學百寶箱。

sentences.english: He will light the cauldron with the torch and release white doves which symbolize peace.
sentences.chinese: 他會用聖火點燃聖火臺，接著釋放代表和平的白鴿。

sentences.english: Thirdly, an initial DO transfer rate is calculated at the aerobic phase.
sentences.chinese: 接著，在好氧相中推估一初始溶氧轉換率。

sentences.english: Moreover, we analyze 958 effective questionnaires for the direct employees.
sentences.chinese: 接著進一步取得有效員工問卷958份進行分析。

sentences.english: Then appeared Dr. James Soong, generally considered the eminence grise of Taiwan's "Blue" movement.
sentences.chinese: 接著由一向被人視爲藍營大內高手的宋博士出來說話。

sentences.english: They were given a rating on a five-point scale to score their level of positive emotions.
sentences.chinese: 接著他們依照正面情緒的程度，根據最高5分來評分。

sentences.english: Lader went on to achieve great success in the new world he had discovered.
sentences.chinese: 雷德接著在他所發現的新世界裏取得了巨大的成就。

sentences.english: The oil, then, runs down Aaron's garment.
sentences.chinese: 那膏油接著流到亞倫的衣襟。

sentences.english: The fox raided the henhouse and ran off with its prize.
sentences.chinese: 狐狸襲擊雞舍，接著帶著俘獲物逃走了。

definition: the rear/far behind the front line
from now on/in the future/time to come
behind/at the back/in the rear/behind sb's back
to recoil/to draw back/to fall back/to retreat
